fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Each night, you may place a fuse on a player. Fuses stay active for that night and the next.
When a player with a fuse is attacked, the fuse goes off and the entire town is notified that a fuse went off from this role.
After 3 following nights the bomb will detonate and kill everyone but you. The only way to stop it is by killing you.
